macroData.name: Relentless Momentum (Use)

description.value:
Relentless Momentum (9th-level Garou feature)

Once your Rage is unleashed, it carries you forward in a tide of violence that is difficult to stop.

While you are raging, when you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points with a melee weapon attack or natural weapon attack, you can immediately make one additional melee weapon attack against another hostile creature within a distance equal to half your walking speed.

  • This additional attack is part of the same action and does not require a bonus action.
  • You can use this feature once on each of your turns.
  • This attack does not trigger form shifting.
description.chat: Relentless Momentum. While raging, when you drop a hostile to 0 HP with a melee or natural weapon attack, you can immediately make one extra melee weapon attack against another hostile within half your speed. Once per turn; does not trigger form shifting.
